title: Thunderbird Primary Password Help
content:
Hi there,

My grandmother on this account keeps receiving a enter primary password alert on her Thunderbird / Bigpond account. We've tried everything and when following the prompts to reset (tools > developer tools > etc) it won't come up with the evaluate button or reset button. We've tried the online sources but no success and she can't access her emails on her desktop. Please let me know what we can do !
creator: sonjonev

title: Unable to install addons in Thunderbird 115
content:
Thunderbird 115.0 on Linux/Debian is unable to verify and install addons from website. It just freezes when I try - and cannot even manually install addons that I download using Chrome. I even totally deleted all files and folders and reinstalled Thunderbird 115.0 from stratch... what happened?!

I found that after total removal - if I install a earlier version... that I can verify and install addons, but not with version 115.

I also found that I cannot import profiles from zip or even uncompressed folder. I confirmed the profile is less that 2 gig (1.2 gig) - so size of the profile should not be a problem.
creator: spaceknight2

title: overi-ride yahoo spam filter
content: pls include code to move all remote server spam content to its inbox [not spam] so thunderbird can do the filtering, and i don't have two or more servers to deal with. thx.
creator: rjp7

title: When I click (compose) 'New Message' the new message window auto minimizes to the Task Bar
content:
I have a new installation of Thunderbird Supernova and when I click (compose) 'New Message' the new message window auto minimizes to the Windows 11 Task Bar and can't be maximized i.e. I can't compose a new message.

I can read and respond to incoming emails as normal.

I'm an experienced Thunderbird user - over many years and devices.
creator: tahmoor223

title: Thunderbird crashes on startup

title: Thunderbird hangs, when trying to add a hyperlink to a graphic
content:
When I try to add a hyperlink to a picture, then the editor freezes.

I think this happend since an thunderbird update.

Can you tell me, how to fix this problem, or can you recommend me a former stable version?
creator: andreas.hagmeier

title: Since the new edition was launched when going to look at newly in emails they do not always instantly go from bold to non bold. Sometimes I have to right click them and mark it as read.

title: lokal folderlar kayboldu
content: Thunderbird sürüm yükseltince lokal folderlar kayboldu. binlerce mailim kayboldu . bilgisayarıma indirdiğim mailleri nasıl kurtarabilirim.
creator: aktepe6035

title: e-mail
content: Just recently when I open an e-mail I get multiple threads, how do I turn this facility off so I only view messages individually from a particular e-mail.
creator: bondts31

title: Mail Address Auto Suggestion
content: I have recently set up and started using Thunderbird with all four of my email accounts. However, when composing an email in the "To" field, I find myself having to manually enter the full email addresses of recipients. Is there a way to access my address book from the imported emails to streamline this process?
creator: akashk1

title: küldés ikon vesztése
content: félkövér szöveg Eltünt a küldés ikon ezért nem tudok üzenetet kűldeni, kérek segítséget: tisztelettel: Andrási Lőrinc
creator: foto.lorinc

title: Gmail account won't save when added
content:
Hi,

I'm having a issue with the current Thunderbird not saving my Gmail account when added.

So, I add it, when I close Thunderbird down and reboot it the Gmail account is gone.

I have three other accounts working fine (A domain name, a Hotmail, and a different Gmail account)

Any idea's?

gat.
creator: gat58
